a.js(1,2): error TS17004: Cannot use JSX unless the '--jsx' flag is provided.
a.js(1,2): error TS2872: This kind of expression is always truthy.
a.js(1,3): error TS17008: JSX element '' has no corresponding closing tag.
a.js(1,4): error TS1003: Identifier expected.
a.js(1,5): error TS1005: '...' expected.
a.js(3,1): error TS1005: '</' expected.

     ~~~~~

     ~~~~~
